resources.string: Alert : For quiz integrity, screencast and screen record features are disabled. Respect the test environment
Alert : To maintain focus, notifications are hidden during the quiz. Ensure an undisturbed experience.

Alert : Lip movement and eyeball tracking are in development for accuracy improvement.\"\" - Updated one - \"Note: Eyeball tracking is in use; avoid lip movement and refrain from speaking during the assessment
Alert : Multiple face detection in quizzes; one face per attempt for fair evaluation.
Alert : Emulator use is restricted during quizzes for a genuine testing environment.
Alert : Avoid moving your face left or right during the assessment for accurate monitoring
Alert :We detect some objects ( Camera , Phone , Laptop etc. ) not allowed in your background
